Text: Grow Some Funk of Your Own:  The song went to #14 on the "Billboard" Hot 100, but in Britain broke a five-year run of successful singles by failing to reach the Top 50 despite extensive radio play.

Text: Grow Some Funk of Your Own:  Although the singles chart listed only "Funk" and not "Bullet", the latter song was given equal billing in later "Billboard" singles chart books.
